item.dc:creator: @EP_President
item.description:
Freedom, democracy and the release of political prisoners was the focus of my conversation with @Tsihanouskaya today.

@Europarl_EN is fully committed to the struggle of the people of Belarus and their right to choose their own future.

Long live free Belarus!

item.title:
